attributes.description:
Phone number: 045-773-4802
Company: pioneer kikaku co.,ltd
Website: http://www.pioneer-kikaku.co.jp/
The company I looked into was Pioneer Kikaku co.,ltd. I researched about one of their product, Pioneer Colorful Choco. This product is a sprinkle that can be a topping for ice cream, brownies or any other sweets.  It was very surprising to see the results that just for one product that isn't very known can be made in over 8 countries total. The brand is very local and can only be purchased in only Japan.
attributes.title: Piping Colorful Choco, ミックスチョコ

attributes.description: The final printing of the package is also done in Yokohama, the writing on the package is done here as well as all the information that is needed.
attributes.title: Printing

attributes.description: The artificial coloring is from Japan. There are several colors to the sprinkle.
attributes.title: Artificial coloring

attributes.description: This product come from Thailand and India. The wax is used to coat the sprinkle once it's done processing to give it a glossy look to it.
attributes.address: Thailand, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi, Delhi 110021, India
attributes.title: Wax

attributes.description: The flavoring scent comes from Holland and Japan. This product is used to flavor the actual sprinkle.
attributes.title: Flavoring scent

attributes.description: Powdered skimmed milk is also in the sprinkle to make it a lot tastier.
attributes.title: Powdered skimmed milk

attributes.description: Whole milk powder is used to make the sprinkle a little more "milky", so it's not just solid chocolate covered in food coloring.
attributes.title: Whole milk powder

attributes.description: This product makes the inside of the sprinkle, chocolate. The original color to Cocoa mass is brown but by adding other products such as milk make it a lighter color
attributes.title: Cocoa mass

attributes.description: Cocoa butter is a big factor for the product I have researched for.
attributes.title: Cocoa butter

attributes.description: The vegetable oil used to make the sprinkles come from Australia and Malaysia.
attributes.title: Vegetable oil
Sugar
attributes.description: The sugar comes from Japan and it comes from here because the quality of sugar here in Japan is excellent, as well as it's easier to purchase since it's within the country.

attributes.title: Cocoa mass to Whole milk powder
